wikipedia_page.main: Galactus Jack, real name Ben Jack is a British DJ and EDM producer who was once one third of House music outfit Aorta and now part of the Message Trust in Manchester, England.

response: There were also sports tournaments, workshops, video game tournaments, and an annual battle of the bands (in which the winner was awarded recording time in a studio).  Added in 2002, the Club became a successful feature of Pitch.  International EDM artists such as Andy Hunter, Galactus Jack, DJ Kubiks,DJ Kubiks and DJ Chris Harrington took part in Pitch and Praise, both in the club and during main sessions.
*Galactus Jack, real name Ben Jack (born 1982), British disc-jockey and producer
